stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 9 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 3 credits from this resource. Use this ability only once per turn.
text:
When you install this resource, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
[click]: Take 3[credit] from this resource. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Telework Contract
